item.title: [CA][Control panel & API] - Product delivery delay
item.description:
Apr 12, 08:28 UTC

Service impact : New product setup maybe delayed and/or interrupted.

item.title: [EU/CA] [Control panel & API/Corporate websites] - Internal infrastructure upgrade
item.description:
Apr 7, 04:40 UTC
Completed - Due to an imponderable, we have to postpone the operation. A new intervention will be scheduled later.

Apr 7, 04:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 30, 16:13 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Mar 30, 14:01 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/04/2022 04:00 UTC
End time : 07/04/2022 05:00 UTC
Service impact : We are upgrading our internal infrastructure. Our Customers with services in Europe and Canada might experience up to 15 mins of downtime whilst connecting to their OVH Manager and the validation of their API tokens and also the process of purchasing services or renewals may be unavailable.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [FR][Support] - Live chat unavailable
item.description:
Mar 11, 14:31 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 11/03/2022 07:14 UTC
End Time : 11/03/2022 12:04 UTC
Service impact : Live chat to reach FR support was unreachable
Root cause : The incident was related to difficulties encountered with our partner on the chat solution.

Mar 11, 12:04 UTC
Monitoring - The live chat is back in operation.

We will keep the situation under observation this afternoon

Mar 11, 11:04 UTC
Identified - Our technical teams determined that the incident was related to difficulties encountered with our partner on the chat solution.
We are working with them to restore service.
We expect to be back online by 14:00 UTC today.
If there is any further delay, we will edit this task

Mar 11, 10:06 UTC
Update - Our technical teams are still investigating the cause of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience caused

Mar 11, 07:49 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/03/2022 07:14 UTC
Service impact : Live chat to reach FR support is not reachable.
You can always contact us by phone, mail or through your Web portal.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating to determine the origin of this unavailability

item.title: [CA][Control panel & API] - customer panel/ca.api.ovh.com
item.description:
Mar 1, 17:35 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 01/03/2022 16:13 UTC
End Time : 01/03/2022 16:30 UTC
Service impact : ca.api.ovh.com is back online.
Root cause :A vRack was unreachable.

Mar 1, 16:39 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 01/03/2022 16:13 UTC
Service impact : ca.api.ovh.com is back online.
Root cause : A vRack was unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Traffic is back to normal since 16:30 UTC.
Our teams are currently observing the traffic.

Mar 1, 16:31 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 01/03/2022 16:13 UTC
Service impact : ca.api.ovh.com is unreachable.
Customers will get some 500 Server Internal Error to some part of their manager.
Canadian customers will have issue ordering products too on ca.ovh.com
Ongoing actions : Our teams are working to solve the problem.
We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
